document_data.name: ''Halaster's Drifting Portals''
document_data.creator: [[Halaster Blackcloak]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Halaster's drifting portals''''' were [[magical]] ''[[portal]]s'' spread throughout the dungeon of [[Undermountain]] beneath [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Powers: As their name implied, these ''portals'' moved about of their own volition. The origin and terminus of each ''portal'' was tied to a general area, but not to a specific location as with other ''portals''. The radius where each ''portal'' traveled was set when it was created and extended up to {{SI|1000|ft|long=yes}}. The ''portals'' moved randomly to include up into the air, but their movement could be controlled if the creator of the ''portal'' concentrated.
document_data.History: These ''portals'' were originally created by the Mad Mage [[Halaster Blackcloak]].
